benchmarks.name: Enable aaa new-model
benchmarks.description: this command enables the AAA access control system
benchmarks.impact: Implementing Cisco AAA immediately disables former default access methods

benchmarks.name: Enable aaa authentication login
benchmarks.description: Sets authentication, authorization, and accounting (AAA), authentication at login
benchmarks.audit: show run | incl aaa authentication login
benchmarks.remediation: aaa authentication login {default | aaa list name} [passwd-expiry] [method1] [method2]
benchmarks.impact: Implementing Cisco AAA immediately disables former default access methods
